about_the_game:
The Legend of Sebb Linus is an old-school top-down stealth game.



Sebb Linus, is a former NCF agent who foiled countless terrorist attacks. There are many stories and legends about him, but few people know the truth. But men like Sebb Linus have become expendable to Sallantica.

The story begins here, 8 months before the events in SF-32, in the Rio'Amaronja Jungle. Brooklyn, the leader of a special unit, was sent by Sallantica to the Rio'Amaronja Jungle to protect a secret government facility from possible terrorist attacks.

But over time, something went wrong. Families and relatives of employees complained that their loved ones were behaving strangely when they spoke to each other on the phone. Others were no longer getting any leave to come home. At some point, contact broke off completely. Units that were sent there never returned.

Now Sallantica was once again reliant on men like Sebb Linus. His last assignment: to infiltrate this secret government facility, which turns out to be a clone laboratory, and find out what's going on.

But TLH also enters the scene and has completely different plans.



Experience the old-school stealth genre here.

Infiltrate enemy bases without being seen by the enemy. Use the room scanner (the radar) to keep an eye on your surroundings.
Sneak past enemy soldiers or take them out unnoticed.
But be careful, hide the bodies before they are discovered by the other soldiers.

Pick locks and hack wires to overcome obstacles.
Use computers to get information.

Experience the story of Sebb Linus, which spans 5 chapters.
There are 3 difficulty levels to choose from, which not only affects the damage, but also the number of guards and sometimes the routes they patrol.

content_descriptors.notes:
Some twists might be a little controversial.

There are some scenes in which the atrocities of a fictional army are depicted, where blood and many corpses can be seen.
